item.title: A Tutor For Every Student | Sunday on 60 Minutes
item.description: Anderson Cooper experiences firsthand how AI-powered tutor Khanmigo could shape the future of education. Sunday on 60 Minutes.

item.title: Body of 64-year-old Elizabeth Pollard found at the site of abandoned Pennsylvania mine
item.description: The Westmoreland Coroner tells KDKA-TV that Pollard's body was found at the site of the abandoned mine.
